description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. RPG meets zombie apocalypse in this action packed 2D retro styled adventure. Play as Alice, a young woman with a huge shotgun and a green bikini. Blast zombies away, find collectables to exchange, carry out dangerous missions to advance the plot and try to escape the massacre. Good Luck!
